titles.title: Waiving points of order against the conference report to accompany the concurrent resolution (H. Con. Res. 95) establishing the congressional budget for the United States Government for fiscal year 2004 and setting forth appropriate budgetary levels for fiscal years 2003 and 2005 through 2013.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 108-72, by Mr. Hastings (WA).
All points of order against the conference report and against its consideration are waived. The conference report shall be considered as read and shall be debatable for one hour.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 24.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 191.
The previous question was ordered without objection.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 221 - 202 (Roll no. 140).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 4/11/2003--Passed House without amendment. (This measure has not been amended since it was introduced in the House on April 10, 2003. The summary of that version is repeated here.)Waives points of order to provide for the consideration of the conference report to accompany H. Con. Res. 95 (establishing the congressional budget for the United States Government for FY 2004 and setting forth appropriate budgetary levels for FY's 2003 and 2005 through 2013).
